Package org.streamexperiments.consumer.integration.tcp

Class TcpConsumerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.streamexperiments.consumer.integration.tcp.TcpConsumerConfiguration
  • @Configuration
@ConditionalOnProperty(value="tcp.enabled",
                       havingValue="true")
public class TcpConsumerConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Gathers Spring Integration stuff related to TCP integration conditionally loaded depending on tcp.enabled property. If that property is set to "true" the configuration will be loaded, otherwise it will not. The expected usage is by means of a @ServiceActivator having "tcpServiceChannel" as input channel.
    See Also:
    ExampleConsumerImpl.tcpToService(Update)

      • clientConnectionFactory

        @Bean
@ConditionalOnProperty(value="tcp.mode",
                       havingValue="client")
public org.springframework.integration.ip.tcp.connection.AbstractClientConnectionFactory clientConnectionFactory​(@Value("${tcp.host}")
                                                                                                                 java.lang.String host,
                                                                                                                 @Value("${tcp.port}")
                                                                                                                 int port)
        Non-blocking Client TCP connection. Conditionally loaded depending on tcp.mode property. It loads with tcp.mode equals to "client".
        Returns:
        AbstractClientConnectionFactory

        @Bean
@ConditionalOnProperty(value="tcp.mode",

public org.springframework.integration.ip.tcp.TcpReceivingChannelAdapter clientInbound​(org.springframework.integration.ip.tcp.connection.AbstractClientConnectionFactory cf)
        Receiving channel adapter for TCP client connection. Has tcpIn() as output channel. And, of course, it depends on the same condition as clientConnectionFactory(String, int)
